processingResourceMetaData.name: JCoRe IGN Reader
processingResourceMetaData.description:
The IGNReader reads IGN corpus files in BioC-format.
There are XML files comprising the actual text (as well as passage and sentence annotations) and there are separate XML files comprising the annotations.

configurationParameter.name: InputDirectoryText
configurationParameter.description: String parameter indicating path to the directory containing files in BioC-format that comprise the actual text.

configurationParameter.name: InputDirectoryAnnotations
configurationParameter.description: String parameter indicating path to the directory containing files in BioC-format that comprise the annotations.

configurationParameter.name: PublicationDatesFile
configurationParameter.description: a file containing a listed mapping between pubmed ids and their articles publication dates If provided, a date annotation will be added to the produced cas and timestamp filtering can be applied by the geno gene mapper.
